elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Solve the following tasks on the choice of legal form.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Make a note of the points to be considered when choosing the legal form.
elements.correctAnswer: Financing, contingent liabilities, tax aspects, desire for anonymity, succession relationships, co-determination rights

elements.name: question2
elements.title: The right choice of legal form is also important if you are considering changing your legal form. Give reasons for changing the existing legal form.
elements.correctAnswer: Change of ownership or death, increase or decrease in turnover, changes in tax law, realignment on the market, reorganization of the company
